subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Domonic Brown hit a two-run homer, and Ryan Howard drove in four runs on Friday, helping David Buchanan and the Philadelphia Phillies beat the visiting Atlanta Braves, 9-3.
snippet: Domonic Brown hit a two-run homer, and Ryan Howard drove in four runs on Friday, helping David Buchanan and the Philadelphia Phillies beat the visiting Atlanta Braves, 9-3.
